load

void load()
Load all icons from the IconTheme

setDefault

void setDefault(IIconTheme def)

getDefault

IIconTheme getDefault()

exists

boolean exists(java.lang.String iconName)
Returns true if the icon theme contains a mapping for the specified iconName.

Parameters:
iconName - The key to check if it has been registered in this IconTheme
Returns:
true if this IconTheme contains iconName, false otherwise.

get

javax.swing.ImageIcon get(java.lang.String iconName)
Gets the ImageIcon associated with the provided key, if the key is present in the theme, or returns null otherwise.

Parameters:
iconName - The key whose associated icon is to be retrieved
Returns:
The icon associated with the provided key, or null otherwise.

get

javax.swing.ImageIcon get(java.lang.String iconName,
                          java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
Gets the ImageIcon associated with the provided key, if the key is present in the theme, or returns null otherwise.

Parameters:
iconName - The key whose associated icon is to be retrieved
loader - Class loader for localice icons when iconName is a resource name.
Returns:
The icon associated with the provided key, or no-icon otherwise.

registerDefault

void registerDefault(java.lang.String iconName,
                     javax.swing.ImageIcon image)

Register in this theme the provided iconName and the associated image. Developers must not override icons already registered, as this defeats the purpose of the IconTheme. Therefore, use the exists method before using register, to ensure the icon is not previously registered.

Parameters:
iconName - The name of the icon to register. It is the name that will be used later to retrieve the icon.
image - The image that is going to be associated with the provided icon name.

registerDefault

void registerDefault(java.lang.String iconName,
                     java.lang.Object resource)

Register in this theme the provided iconName and the associated resource. Developers must not override icons already registered, as this defeats the purpose of the IconTheme. Therefore, use the exists method before using register, to ensure the icon is not previously registered.

Parameters:
iconName - The name of the icon to register. It is the name that will be used later to retrieve the icon.
resource - The resource that is going to be asssocioated with the providad icon name

register

void register(java.lang.String iconName,
              javax.swing.ImageIcon image)

Register in this theme the provided iconName and the associated image. Developers must not override icons already registered, as this defeats the purpose of the IconTheme. Therefore, use the exists method before using register, to ensure the icon is not previously registered.

Parameters:
iconName - The name of the icon to register. It is the name that will be used later to retrieve the icon.
image - The image that is going to be associated with the provided icon name.

register

void register(java.lang.String iconName,
              java.lang.Object resource)

Register in this theme the provided iconName and the associated resource. Developers must not override icons already registered, as this defeats the purpose of the IconTheme. Therefore, use the exists method before using register, to ensure the icon is not previously registered.

Parameters:
iconName - The name of the icon to register. It is the name that will be used later to retrieve the icon.
resource - The resource that is going to be asssocioated with the providad icon name

setName

void setName(java.lang.String themeName)

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Gets the theme description.

Returns:
The description of this theme.

setDescription

void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
Sets the theme description. It should be a short description (around 20-30 words), including the highlights of the theme, the author and maybe its email address or a link the the theme's homepage.

Parameters:
description -

getVersion

java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns the theme version. It defaults to "1.0".

Returns:
The version of this theme.

setVersion

void setVersion(java.lang.String version)
Set the theme version.

Parameters:
version -

getResource

java.lang.Object getResource()
Gets the Object which contains physically contains this theme on disk. It may be a ZipFile or JarFile, or a directory.

Returns:

setResource

void setResource(java.lang.Object resource)
Sets the file which contains physically contains this theme on disk. It may be a ZipFile or JarFile, or a directory.

getURL

java.net.URL getURL(java.lang.String iconName)
Deprecated. 

Return the URL which is currently associated with the provided icon name, if this icon was registered as an URL, or null if it is not present in the theme or it was registered as an IconImage.

Parameters:
iconName -
Returns:
The URL which is currently associated with the provided icon name, if this icon was registered as an URL, or null if it is not present in the theme or it was registered as an IconImage.
